review: Bought it to replace a sony smart blu ray player that has been giving me streaming problems for a while now. had the fire stick for a few days easy set up from the get go( 2 stars for the easy set up). Sign in to Hulu and streamed fine the first day. The following day it had trouble with video freezing but audio still going. Netflix had no sound and took a while to load. Not what I expected since I had fairly high expectation for it. Maybe I got a bad one but I just returned it and got my money back.
